ai-patthana23.47:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.47:0.3_0: He is for the sake of his (permission) seeing clearly, for the sake of oneself,
ai-patthana23.47:1.1_0: One should not give up resentment for the sake of not-self. It should be given up by seeing causes and conditions with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana23.47:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.47:2.1_0: One should not give up no resentment for the development of the path, nor gives rise to the root of repulsion.
ai-patthana23.47:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.47:3.1_0: One should not give up no resentment for the development of the path, or for the sake of seeing, nor for the sake of developing, or to the path for the sake of developing, or to the practice.
ai-patthana23.47:3.1_1: the section on the same cause,
